org.jhove2.module.identify
Class DROIDAnalysisController

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.module.identify.DROIDAnalysisController
All Implemented Interfaces:
JHOVE2IAnalysisController
public class DROIDAnalysisController
extends Object
implements JHOVE2IAnalysisController

This is a condensation and adaptation of uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.AnalysisController Essentially, methods here have been copied from the altered version of that class included in the JHOVE2 distribution, with some additional accessor/mutator and convenience methods, and a few additional modification to suppress unwanted features. Please see the file DROID-LICENSE.txt in the JHOVE2 distribution for a complete statement of the BSD license rights governing the use of DROID source code.

Author:
smorrissey

addFile

public void addFile(String fileFolderName)
Add files to list of files ready for identifier. Calls addFile(fileFolderName, false)

Parameters:
fileFolderName - file or folder to add to

addFile

public void addFile(String fileFolderName,
                    boolean isRecursive)
Add file to list of files ready for identifier. If the file is already in list, then does not add it. If the file is a folder, then adds all files it contains. If isRecursive is set to true, then it also searches recursively through any subfolders.

Parameters:
fileFolderName - file or folder to add to
isRecursive - whether or not to search folders recursively

removeFile

public void removeFile(String theFileName)
Remove file from the file list

Parameters:
theFileName - the name of the file to remove

downloadwwwSigFile

public void downloadwwwSigFile()
Download the latest signature file from the PRONOM web service, save it to a DEFAULT location and load it in to the current instance of uk Saves to same folder as current signature file but as DROID_Signature_V[X].xml , where [X] is the version number of the signature file

setSigFileCheckFreq

public void setSigFileCheckFreq(String theFreq)
Updates the configuration parameter which records the interval after which the signature file should be updated.

Parameters:
theFreq - The number of days after which the user will be prompted to check for a newer signature file

updateDateLastDownload

public void updateDateLastDownload()
updates the DateLastDownload element of the configuration file and updates the configuration file. This is to be used whenever the user checks for a signature file update, but one is not found
